body_html: @petewarden Are there any way to identify whether a node is in a control loop or not, so that I could only add control inputs on those nodes. Otherwise maybe I should add float_node.name().find("/while/") != string::npos in this PR, which is a dirty solution but good enough for quantizing dynamic_rnn.
body_text: @petewarden Are there any way to identify whether a node is in a control loop or not, so that I could only add control inputs on those nodes. Otherwise maybe I should add float_node.name().find("/while/") != string::npos in this PR, which is a dirty solution but good enough for quantizing dynamic_rnn.
body: @petewarden Are there any way to identify whether a node is in a control loop or not, so that I could only add control inputs on those nodes. Otherwise maybe I should add `float_node.name().find("/while/") != string::npos` in this PR, which is a dirty solution but good enough for quantizing `dynamic_rnn`.
